name: unfetter-api-explorer
description: Unfetter API Explorer: Swagger documentation for Unfetter Discover API

scripts.compile:swagger: cd ../unfetter-discover-api && multi-file-swagger multifile-remote.yaml > ../unfetter-api-explorer/src/assets/swagger.json && cd ../unfetter-api-explorer && cp ./src/assets/swagger.json ./src/explorer/assets/swagger.json && swagger validate ./src/assets/swagger.json
scripts.start: npm run build && cp index.html dist/ && http-server -p 3200 dist/

author: UNFETTER
